comments.body: // Older client code accidentally set event.Namespace to api.NamespaceDefault, so we accept that too, but "" is preferred.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@	// to api.NamespaceDefault, so we accept that too, but "" is preferred.
	if event.InvolvedObject.Kind == "Node" &&
		event.Namespace != api.NamespaceDefault &&
		event.Namespace != "" {
		allErrs = append(allErrs, validation.NewInvalidError(validation.NewFieldPath("involvedObject", "namespace"), event.InvolvedObject.Namespace, "namespace is not required for node"))
